name: Kibi: The Lost Harmony
description:
Controls - 

WASD or Arrow Keys to move.

Hold Spacebar to call the Kibi orb which helps you in interacting with objects.

Interact with Left Click on highlighted objects.

Find all the Kibi's lost in the world to bring harmony back.

A pretty simple game I developed for the Brackeys jam.

Feedback is appreciated, Not playtested it much so expect a few bugs or a lot of them!

Assets downloaded from asset store and free to use art and sound websites.
